title: Secret Vampire
description: Love was never so scary...The Night World is all around us—a secret society of vampires, werewolves, witches and creatures of darkness. They’re beautiful—and deadly—and it’s so easy to fall in love...Synopsis:Poppy is dying. Her best friend, James can offer her eternal life. One kiss and she sees into his soul. But can she follow him into death and beyond?
author: L.J. Smith
